16387268341934210306.Text: To get to Lake Amaya, go southeast out of Balmora, past Fort Moonmoth. Then follow the signs and take the road to Pelagiad. After you cross the Foyada Mamaea, go towards Suran at the next crossroads. All the flowers Ajira needs are near the path to Suran which runs along the north shore of Lake Amaya.
